flawed_nl_solution:
With the bakery stop, Kona drove a total of 9 + 24 + 27 = <<9+24+27=57>>57 miles.
Without the bakery stop, Kona drove a total of 27 + 27 = <<27+27=54>>54 miles.
With the bakery stop, Kona drives an additional 57 - 54 = <<57-54=3>>3 miles.
